original_text:
In just a little while, the wicked will be no more;
    though you look carefully at his place, he will not be there.
korean_text: 잠시 후에는 악인이 없어지리니 네가 그 곳을 자세히 살필지라도 없으리로다

sentences.original_text: the wicked will be no more;
though you look carefully at his place,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그의 있는 곳을 자세히 살펴보아도,
